Interface SphericalCS

All Superinterfaces:
Coordinate­System, Identified­Object
All Known Implementing Classes:
Default­Spherical­CS
@UML(identifier="CS_SphericalCS", specification=ISO_19111) public interface SphericalCS extends CoordinateSystem
A three-dimensional coordinate system with one distance measured from the origin and two angular coordinates. Not to be confused with an ellipsoidal coordinate system based on an ellipsoid "degenerated" into a sphere. A Spherical­CS shall have three axis associations.
Used with CRS type(s)
Geocentric, Engineering
Since:
1.0
